title: How All The American Horror Story Seasons Are Connected
author: WatchMojo.com
comment: Do more about AHS sure more people would appreciate it too

I liked how the first few seasons were strong on their own despite being a shared universe, but lately they sort of relied too much on the fact that they are connected. I know it's what a lot of fans want, to see the characters collide, but I feel like they did that badly.
Well I'm not surprised apocalypse kind of said hey were one universe
I just want them to do something with the aliens from season 2 and the kids
You know what could be pretty cool, for season 9 or possibly a future season? If they showed us a young Constance before she moved to LA. Before she moved into the Murder House the first time.
description:
With 1984 on the horizon, it’s time to explain how all the American Horror Story seasons are connected. In case you’re not caught up on the first eight seasons, you’ll need to burn some sage to keep any spoilers away. Universal’s Dark Universe may be dead and buried, but the American Horror Story universe is more than alive! WatchMojo discusses how all the American Horror Story seasons are connected. Are there any connections we missed? Let us know in the comments!

Watch more great AHS related content here:
